title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View later, for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.
name: Xandromus

title: Authoentication vs. Authorization
content: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorization means being allowed access to the system.
name: Xandromus

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: I have really loved learning ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!
name: Lernantino

title: Session Storage
content: Session storage can be thought about a lot like local storage, with one exception. Instead of sa v ing on your local hard drive it is saved in your browser and cleared when a tab is closed.
name: jdelvalle

title: Handlebars
content: Handlebars is a simple templating language. It uses a template and an input object to generate HTML or other text formats. Handlebars templates look like regular text with embedded Handlebars expressions. A handlebars expression is a {{, some contents, followed by a }}. When the template is executed, these expressions are replaced with values from an input object.
name: jdelvalle
